active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate the trade-offs of strict SecCM baselines versus DevOps agility in preventing breaches like SolarWinds: How does rigid CM enhance security, and what risks does it introduce to operational speed? Provide evidence from NIST SP 800-128.
active_learning.peer_teaching: In pairs, one partner explains one of the four NIST SP 800-128 SecCM phases (Planning, Identifying/Implementing Configurations, Controlling Changes, Monitoring) using a hand-drawn diagram; the partner teaches it back and quizzes on key elements like CCB role.
active_learning.problem_solving: Analyze a scenario where an unauthorized configuration change exposes assets (e.g., unpatched server baseline drift): Identify CCB failures, perform inventory and impact analysis, and propose fixes integrating SecCM phases and tools like Ansible for baseline enforcement.
